cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Oversight and Reform on July 20, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 8217, a bill to designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 430 South Knowles Avenue in New Richmond, Wisconsin, as the “Captain Robert C. Harmon and Private John R. Peirson Post Office Building

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 107 (Thursday, June 23, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. TIFFANY:
H.R. 8217.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8
[Page H5879]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.

title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 430 South Knowles Avenue in New Richmond, Wisconsin, as the "Captain Robert C. Harmon and Private John R. Peirson Post Office Building".
